CustomField.formula: IF(TotalLicencesAttachedToThisOrder__c > TotalLicencesPurchased__c, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "red flag"), IF(TotalLicencesPurchased__c > TotalLicencesAttachedToThisOrder__c , IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow flag"), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "green flag")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Green Lag - If the Total Licences Purchased = Total Licences Attached Yellow Flag - If the Total Licences Purchased is greater than Total Licences Attached Red Flag - If the Total Licences Attached is greater than Total Licences Purchased
CustomField.label: TotalLicencesPurchasedVsAttached
